FuncDef: By default, load balancing is supported. For details about the maximum number of equal-cost routes, see the parameter value range.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of equal-cost routes that can load-balance traffic.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128. The default value is 64.

ExtraInfo: To configure the maximum number of equal-cost routes for load balancing, run the maximum load-balancing command. Bear memory capacity in mind when configuring the number.
